constituent: graduate, top hat, assembly line, person, ten, needle, person2
koohiiStory1: Ph.D graduation for assembly line of doctors(needles) with the cap and tassel(top hat). It took them 10 years (Bachelor´s, Masters, PhD) to get there.... :-p.
koohiiStory2: When you graduate, you wear a hat and graduate in an assembly line while your parents sit on pins and needles because it will take ten years to pay off those loans.
kunYomi: そっ.する、お.える、お.わる、ついに、にわか
